attributes.action: Assign an official "Clap for our NHS" Day Annually.
attributes.additional_details:
Just a day that thanks the NHS and keeps the appreciation for their hard work that they do 365 days a year. an 8pm nation wide clap on the day and possibly a press campaign on the day where there are thank you NHS posters in press/social etc 

Lets not let the NHS be taken for granted anymore!
attributes.background: I believe Covid-19 has highlighted how important the key workers in the NHS are. We take them for the granted and have only started to acknowledge them recently for their efforts. We need an annual day where we all come together and keep this appreciate going once this pandemic is over!
